short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for laranow.com. Create highlights for PDFs and Websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension to use with laranow.com. With this chrome extension you can contribute with your team on laranow.com, highlighting, commenting PDFs and Webpages.

More detailed information can be found in the LARA's privacy policy (https://www.laranow.com/privacy-policy)
